block.p: Katherine Lynne Applebaum, a daughter of Elizabeth and Harvey Applebaum of Washington, was married there last evening to James Franklin Lowy, a son of Jacqueline and Sherman Lowy of Delray Beach, Fla. Rabbi Joshua Haberman officiated at the Cosmos Club.

Mrs. Lowy, 30, is a consultant to public educational institutions working in the Tampa, Fla., office of KPMG Consulting. She graduated from the University of Wisconsin at Madison and received a master's degree in public administration from Columbia University. Her father is a partner in Covington & Burling, the Washington law firm.

Katherine Lynne Applebaum, a daughter of Elizabeth and Harvey Applebaum of Washington, was married there last evening to James Franklin Lowy, a son of Jacqueline and Sherman Lowy of Delray Beach, Fla. Rabbi Joshua Haberman officiated at the Cosmos Club.

Mrs. Lowy, 30, is a consultant to public educational institutions working in the Tampa, Fla., office of KPMG Consulting. She graduated from the University of Wisconsin at Madison and received a master's degree in public administration from Columbia University. Her father is a partner in Covington & Burling, the Washington law firm.

Mr. Lowy, 33, is a partner in Snow, Lowy & Roth, a Tampa law firm. He graduated from Duke University and received his law degree from the University of Florida at Gainesville. His father retired as a partner in Lowy & Donnath, electrical contractors in Long Island City, Queens.
